EmailTemplate.name: Clubs 2012-13
EmailTemplate.subject: Club Forms 2012-13 Upper Campus
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
All club forms have now been updated. Click here to download the updated version of the form. Please ensure that you return this updated version of the form.
All class tutors have club descriptions and should be sharing these with the children. If children are still unsure on what a club involves they can check the club descriptions located near the PE office.
Regards,
Mr. Hoult PE Department The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
